ValidationRule.description: This is used to make sure that the Case reason is filled in when the case is closed for the PEO Service center Record Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name ,'System Admin')) && RecordTypeId = "01270000000UIeT" && ISPICKVAL(Reason,"") && (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed") || ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed - First Call Resolution"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Case Reason before closing the case.
